short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mutex lets you control which tabs are audible and visible from your phone! It ensures you'll only hear audio from one tab at a time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mutex lets you control which tabs are audible and visible from a second device, while keeping only one audio stream playing at once. For instance, you can easily switch to a different game during commercial break with just one tap!
